page.title: 07ORMSKIRK AND ITS PLAIN
page.content: Ormskirk is a small town which is well known for it's twice weekly market. It is located in South West Lancashire near the major centres of Liverpool Manchester and Wigan. The New town of Skelmersdale lies to the South East and the holiday town of Southport to the West.Ormskirk is a major commuter town for Liverpool. The surrounding area is relatively flat with the highest point in our block being 70 metres above sea level. The soils around the town are rich making it an important agricultural area. The main crops are cereals and various vegetables most notably potatoes for which Ormskirk has a good reputation. The vegetables are sold at markets in the north west especially Liverpool and Manchester.
